nodes.text: Two months after causing chaos on Milvayne, Chelli Aphra and Vulaada Klam infiltrated the Slinani Migration Shrine Red Mist. During the infiltration, Aphra sliced one of the defending "janitor droids" to destroy its peers and collect a cape. She and Klam later discovered and stole the Farkiller, a lightsaber sniper rifle hybrid notoriously used by the renegade Jedi Oo'ob, before escaping more "janitor droids."

The infiltration of the Red Mist first appeared in the canon comic book Doctor Aphra 32, which was written by Simon Spurrier, illustrated by Wilton Santos and Caspar Wijngaard, and released on May 8 2019.
